sentences.sentence: One online pundit said that Obama sounded "like a grumpy old man".
sentences.translation: 一位网络权威人士表示，奥巴马听起来“像一个脾气暴躁的老头”。

sentences.sentence: One online pundit said that Obama sounded "like a grumpy old man".
sentences.translation: 一位网络权威人士表示，奥巴马听起来“像一个脾气暴躁的老头”。

sentences.sentence: Do your kids go off to school feeling calm and confident? Or are they upset and grumpy?
sentences.translation: 你的孩子们去上学的时候，是心情平静、充满信心，还是心烦意乱、脾气暴躁？
